definition:
Let $L={{\mathbb}{Q}}(\zeta_m)$ be a cyclotomic extension of
${{\mathbb}{Q}}$ with $m$ chosen to be minimal. Then the ring of
integers is given by ${{\mathbb}{Z}}(\zeta_m)$, and we denote the group
of units by ${\mathcal}{O}_L^\times$. *The cyclotomic units* are the
elements of a subgroup $C$ of ${\mathcal}{O}_L^\times$ given by
$$\begin{aligned}
\eta=\frac{\zeta_m^r-1}{\zeta_m^s-1}\end{aligned}$$ with $r$ and $s$
relatively prime to $m$.
